name: Robo-Dido
description:
Get the Jewel to the terminal at the expense of your robot helpers!

A physics, breakable terrain, puzzle game inspired by Lemmings, King Arthur’s World, and Worms.

CONTROLS:

Mouse - LB- select, RB - scroll camera

NOTE for Mac users: After downloading, move the .app file out of the downloads folder or you may get an error trying to open it.
